events.message: The policyholder reported a car accident involving a collision with another vehicle on Main Street. Filing initiated for assessment.
Claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords indicating a vehicle collision and damages.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to the case to ensure timely handling and clear communication with the claimant.
Claimant received an acknowledgment email confirming the receipt of the auto accident claim and next steps outlined.
Request sent to the customer asking for police report, photographs of the vehicle damage, and insurance card copies.
All requested documents, including accident photos and official police report, were submitted promptly by the claimant.
Investigation into the accident circumstances commenced, examining submitted evidence and contacting involved parties.
Investigation concluded, confirming liability and extent of damages to the claimant’s vehicle after the collision.
A settlement offer covering repair costs and rental car reimbursement was presented to the claimant for consideration.
Claimant expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the clear communication throughout the process.
The claim was officially approved by underwriting after settlement acceptance, paving way for payment issuance.
Payment for the approved settlement amount was processed and sent to the claimant’s designated bank account.
Following successful payment issuance, the auto accident claim was formally closed in the system with no outstanding issues.
